div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: Today was supposed to be the State Speech Tournament. Here is a positive message from the varsity speech team. "COVID-19 can't take away our love for Hornet Speech" #HenningStrong #HornetPride
A nice message from the Grieger family this morning for our Paraprofessionals and Food Service Staff. #HenningStrong #HornetPride
The OTC Bulldog wants to make sure you are all staying safe. #HenningStrong #HornetPride

A huge thank you to Jim Espeland & ⁦@FNBHenning⁩ for your generous
support of the Henning community & ⁦@OTC_Baseball⁩ to make this scoreboard happen ⚾️ We are very fortunate to have the support of our community bank. ⁦@HenningSupt⁩
⁦@bighendy025⁩

We have just wrapped up week 2 of distance learning, and I want to thank you for your patients and understanding as we work to provide your children with a quality education during these challenging times. Here is an update on week three distance learning, we are continuing to make adjustments, but will be asking families to provide feedback in a survey at the end of the week.
Governor Walz extended the stay at home order until May 4th, so teachers will continue to be providing distance learning lessons from their homes.

Please remember that you may contact Mrs. Damm or Mr.Williams at Henning Public School if the new format of learning or the stress of the COVID-19 pandemic is causing anxiety or stress to your children.
Mrs. Damm- jdamm@henning.k12.mn.us Mr. Williams- twilliams@henning.k12.mn.us

Monday, April 13 - No School
Tuesday, April 14 - Period 2 @ 11:00 & Period 6 @ 1:00
Wednesday, April 15 - Period 3 @ 11:00 & Period 7 @ 1:00
Thursday, April 16 - Period 4 @ 11:00 & Period 8 @ 1:00
Friday, April 17 - Period 1 @ 11:00 & Period 5 @ 1:00
Elementary classes will meet at their normal times daily.
